class.title: Building Your First App
class.description: Step-by-step guide on building you first Couchbase Lite app.

introduction.paragraph: This article walks you through step-by-step the basics of developing with Couchbase Lite. You will learn: How to set up your Couchbase Lite app How to use fundamental Couchbase Lite concepts such as: Creating a Database Creating, Reading, Updating and Deleting Data Querying and Sorting
